name: Muk
description: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit.  This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust.  This ability takes effect before mummy.
abilities.description: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.effect: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Power of Alchemy
abilities.effect: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
abilities.description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
